attributes.action: allow project Kangaroo to go ahead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed joint venture by the ITV, BBC, and Channel 4 to provide the British public with a vast free achieve of TV content has been blocked. Because of this, the public are losing a valuable entertainment resource. The competition commission are not blocking a monopoly but a free VOD service for the public. The government should use legislation to allow this proposed venture to go ahead.
